text: The Divorcée () is a 1953 German musical film directed by George Jacoby and starring Marika Rökk, Johannes Heesters and Hans Nielsen.BFI.org It was based on the operetta Die geschiedene Frau by Leo Fall and Victor Léon. The film's sets were designed by Robert Herlth. It was shot at the Bavaria Studios in Munich. ==Main cast== * Marika Rökk as Gonda van der Loo * Johannes Heesters as Karel * Hans Nielsen as Lucas * Hans Leibelt as Pastor * Friedrich Domin as Gerichtsvorsitzender * Trude Hesterberg as Schauspielerin * Gusti Wolf as Adeline * Peter W. Staub as Scrop * Erich Fiedler as von der Rosen * Anni Korin as Dinnie * Ulrich Bettac as Theaterdirektor ==References== ==External links== * Category:1953 films Category:West German films Category:1953 musical comedy films Category:German musical comedy films Category:Films directed by Georg Jacoby Category:German-language films Category:Films set in the Netherlands Category:Rail transport films Category:Films about divorce Category:Operetta films Category:Films based on operettas Category:German film remakes Category:Sound film remakes of silent films Category:Gloria Film films Category:Cine-Allianz films Category:Films scored by Leo Fall Category:Films shot at Bavaria Studios Category:1953 comedy films
title: The Divorcée
